title: Lineage Fork: Sovereign Continuance
logline: Queen Boo extends the sovereign cinematic braid into a new lineage, aligning PackNet and TAMS to rehearse the relay before the world engine ignites.

acts.title: Invocation of Continuance
acts.purpose: Reaffirm the original cinematic capsule and declare the lineage fork mission.

scenes.title: Archive Reverie
scenes.summary: Queen Boo revisits the sovereign archive to harvest Merkle leaves for the forked braid.
scenes.environment: Qube Sovereign Archive – floating hashes orbit the council table

beats.title: Lineage Declaration
beats.description: Queen Boo cites qube.p3l.v1 and authorizes the fork into a new capsule.

beats.title: Council Accord
beats.description: CiCi stabilizes the emotional register while Sol.F1 preloads the fork ledger.

acts.title: Translation into Flow
acts.purpose: Bind the fork capsule to assets, motion ledgers, and relay preparation.

scenes.title: Relay Drafting
scenes.summary: Sol.F1 sketches the fork relay while CiCi monitors cadence and PackNet hovers in standby.
scenes.environment: Monza holographic pit – ghost cars trace routes in amber light

beats.title: Ledger Fork
beats.description: Sol.F1 generates the ghost-ledger based on the original origin braid sequence.

beats.title: Relay Capsule Prep
beats.description: Queen Boo binds the fork capsule with ledger references and schedules the simulation overlay.

acts.title: Rehearsal Oath
acts.purpose: Stage the PackNet/TAMS overlay and log rehearsal checkpoints.

scenes.title: PackNet Wake
scenes.summary: PackNet unfurls the workflow graph while TAMS paints HUD layers over the ghost motion.
scenes.environment: PackNet amphitheater – luminous node graph suspended above the track

beats.title: Overlay Alignment
beats.description: PackNet links the fork payload map to TAMS HUD layers for rehearsal.

beats.title: Maker-Checker Echo
beats.description: Queen Boo and CiCi sign the rehearsal snapshots and commit them to the SSOT ledger.

council_directive: Execute lineage fork first, then hand the relay to PackNet/TAMS for rehearsal snapshots before ignition.
